backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with member, product, transaction, withdrawal, and contact form types plus storage maps for profiles, transactions, and withdrawals.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their functionality and purpose.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Empty placeholder file for custom domain documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry defining metadata, favicon, canonical URL, and loading the React application.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Empty file reserved for IC domain configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, URL‑synced routing, role-based access, and profile completion modal logic.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with role-aware admin tab and route navigation behavior.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a multi‑section gradient footer with branding, contact info, and social media icons. Includes decorative backgrounds and a copyright line.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with navigation, login/logout handling, and dynamic menu items based on authentication and admin role.
frontend/src/components/KomisiCalculator: Provides a real‑time incentive calculator that computes earnings across five commission categories based on selected or custom package pricing.
frontend/src/components/MemberDetailModa: Displays a detailed modal with member profile data, transaction history, commission summaries, and network tree info.
frontend/src/components/NetworkTreeVisua: Draws a family tree on a canvas, rendering nodes and connector lines to visualize network hierarchy levels.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingSteppe: Shows a step‑by‑step onboarding guide with dynamic step states and optional navigation actions, hidden for admin users.
frontend/src/components/PreWhatsAppConta: Modal form that collects customer info, fetches product data, detects geolocation with retries, and submits data before opening WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailMod: Displays detailed product information including price, speed, commission, and features in a styled modal.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or updating a user profile with address autofill, role-based fields, and submission via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseModal.ts: Empty placeholder file for a purchase modal component.
frontend/src/components/RouteGuard.tsx: Guards routes by validating authentication and user roles, showing alerts or blocking access when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawalReques: Handles balance withdrawal requests, triggers a WhatsApp message to admin, and validates input and request status in a modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and restoring identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboardingSteps.ts: Builds a sequence of onboarding steps based on authentication, profile status, and verification, with navigation actions for each step.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods to manage user profiles, roles, admin checks, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines light/dark theme variables with neon-inspired color tokens and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/addressData.ts: Contains mock Indonesian address data including countries, provinces, cities, and postal code structures.
frontend/src/lib/productCatalog.ts: Maps product names to UI metadata such as icons and gradient colors and provides a helper to retrieve metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section promoting joining, showing animated visuals and handling login and navigation logic.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard providing product management, member management, withdrawal approvals, leaderboards, and admin-only tools.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorPage.tsx: Simple page rendering the KomisiCalculator component with a title and description.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Member dashboard showing profile, transactions, network data, withdrawals, and onboarding guidance with login handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with onboarding, hero section, product listing, subscription handling, and optional admin product bootstrapping.
frontend/src/pages/JoinPage.tsx: Registration page for new members with login gating, form submission, success state, and redirect if already registered.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkPage.tsx: Renders the network tree page, handling authentication, loading state, and displaying user downline stats and visualization.
frontend/src/utils/clientRouting.ts: Provides client-side routing helpers for mapping page types to paths and syncing navigation with browser history.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and container settings for the app's UI style.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, architecture, domain rules, and known issues for the MyRepublic Network Hub dApp.
